title: Orwell: Keeping an Eye on You
brief_description: Safeguard society by spying on your fellow citizens in this game based on the themes of George Orwell’s novel 1984 (1949).

constellations_primary.name: Orwell & Snowden
constellations_primary.description: Explores Orwell as a representation of the NSA, and the infamous Snowden leak.

description: Safeguard society by spying on your fellow citizens in this game based on the themes of George Orwell’s novel 1984 (1949). Transforming the dystopian thriller into a click-and-play game set in our contemporary online world, players are cast as government operatives who trawl social media profiles to uncover terrorists and political dissidents. Orwell: Keeping an Eye on You presents players with moral dilemmas, forcing them to think about their own ethics and beliefs when responding to the game’s reflection of our current society. It also asks them to analyse the effect of surveillance culture on society and the proliferation of false information and fake news.
